# Summary

* Challenge = communicating results
    * make "big", small, digestible and understandable;
    * visualise it
    
* Understand the social context of the data
    * understand the systems at work that have generated the data
    
* Watch out for biases and assumptions in understanding
    * Use social systems to catch biases
    
* Collect the right data, but also consider how it is to be used.
